definitions.text: the act of scanning; systematic examination of a prescribed region
examples: he made a thorough scan of the beach with his binoculars
you could see the tumor in the CAT scan
She scanned the newspaper headlines while waiting for the taxi

definitions.text: make a wide, sweeping search of
examples: The beams scanned the night sky

definitions.text: move a light beam over; in electronics, to reproduce an image

examples: This dictionary can be read by the computer
